dataset.title: GIS13 GIS Coverages Defining Konza Wildfire and Supplementary Burn History

address.deliveryPoint: 116 Ackert Hall, Division of Biology, Kansas State University

abstract.para: This dataset contains a comprehensive record of supplemental burns, wildfires, wildfire cleanup burns for the Konza Prairie Biological Station (KPBS) dating from 1972. Burn history data contains date burned, area burned and type of treatment (wildfires, wildfire cleanup, and supplemental burns). Burn histories for planned, prescribed burns are available in dataset GIS05. These data are available as zipped (.zip) shapefiles (.shp).

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Riley CountyGeary countyKansasKonza Prairie Biological StationKNZLTER

spatialVector.entityName: GIS130 Wildfires and supplementary burns for 1973

Burn history data contains date burned, area burned and type of treatment (wildfires, wildfire cleanup, and supplemental burns). Burn histories for planned, prescribed burns are available in dataset GIS05. This datatype reprensents wildfires and supplementary burns for 1973.

parameter.name: Scale factor at central meridian
parameter.description: a multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling to the actual distance along the central meridian.

parameter.name: Longitude at central meridian
parameter.description: The line of logitude at the center of the map projection

parameter.name: Latitude of projection origin
parameter.description: The latitude chosen as center of the projection

parameter.name: False Easting
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

parameter.name: False Northing
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

parameter.name: Scale factor at central meridian
parameter.description: a multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling to the actual distance along the central meridian.

parameter.name: Longitude at central meridian
parameter.description: The line of logitude at the center of the map projection

parameter.name: Latitude of projection origin
parameter.description: The latitude chosen as center of the projection

parameter.name: False Easting
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

parameter.name: False Northing
parameter.description: A value added in a rectangular coordinate system, usually used to avoid negative values

spatialVector.entityName: GIS148 Wildfires and supplementary burns for 2010
spatialVector.entityDescription: This dataset contains a comprehensive record of supplemental burns, wildfires, wildfire cleanup burns for the Konza Prairie Biological Station (KPBS) dating from 1972. Burn history data contains date burned, area burned and type of treatment (wildfires, wildfire cleanup, and supplemental burns). Burn histories for planned, prescribed burns are available in dataset GIS05. This datatype reprensents wildfires and supplementary burns for 2010.
